answers.answer: Im not sure what you mean. I have never heard that that would be a side affect of sugar in take. Is this something your doctor told you?
I have gestational diabetes and they didn't say anything to me about that. Just said I had to control it because it can make you have a large baby and cause fetal death in the last 2 mths.

they told me that but i had to get a echo test for me and my baby heart and they said his heart is thickened a little but the heart doctor that did my baby's said nothings wrong. but i know i have to keep it down.

question: is it bad if your baby heart a little thickened bc of your sugar? will it go down?  have anyone had/ has this issue ?
title: a little worried
